ygData.subject: Smithing and special item
ygData.msgSnippet: There may be a smith or two among our warrior kin so I will ask this of you all. You may know the answer regardless. I have come into possession of a blade
ygData.messageBody:
There may be a smith or two among our warrior kin so I will ask this of you all. You may know the answer regardless.

I have come into possession of a blade mold. This item should be used with the smithing skill to make a sword of some kind. Does anyone know what other components are needed? What the recipe for creating the sword is? What is the smithing skill required for success? I myself am not a smith, but I know quite a few trustworthy ones on Bertox.

If anyone is interested I will post the total solution to the blade mold quest when I complete it.
